snippet: A long-running class action lawsuit had accused the state of shortchanging doctors and leaving low-income families to trek long distances to visit specialists.
abstract: Florida health officials settle federal class-action lawsuit filed in 2005, agreeing to improve access to health care for children in low-income families.
lead_paragraph: A long-running class action lawsuit had accused the state of shortchanging doctors and leaving low-income families to trek long distances to visit specialists.

headline.main: Florida Agrees to Improve Poor Children’s Access to Health Care, Settling Suit
headline.print_headline: Florida Agrees to Improve Poor Children’s Access to Health Care, Settling Suit
